allinfo.henrydescription:
I was raised in Minnesota by my parents Galina & Peter along with my one younger sister Elizabeth. I grew up in St. Paul but graduated from a high school in Apple Valley. I joined the US Marine Corps in 2001 and served four years which included two tours in Iraq. After being honorably discharged in 2005, I wanted to continue my education and focus on starting my career.


I received a B.S. in Operations Management from Remington College in San Diego and have worked for technology companies such as THQ and Microsoft. I am currently a Mobile Product Manager and get to work with some of the latest mobile technologies. According to Nicole, my geekiness is very attractive to her so I guess I lucked out. You can be a geek and still get a hot chick.
allinfo.nicoledescription:
I was born and raised in Hawaii by my parents Kathleen & Craig along with my sister and brother Jen & Rick. Being the youngest and loving attention, I always had a story, song or dance to share. I graduated from Aiea High School, then got my bachelor degree in Communication at the University of Hawaii. A few years after graduating college, I moved to St Paul, Minnesota to live with my mom. I am so glad I did, not only was I lucky enough to find love, I was able to establish my career.


Today, I am in Business Banking and have been with Wells Fargo Bank since 2006. When I am not working, I enjoy baking cookies & cakes for my coworkers and friends. I also love to take yoga classes which I’ve been doing for the last 10 years. I have two gatos, Oliver & Bella and a lovebird named Taj.
allinfo.usdescription:
How we met...


It all started back in December of 2005 when I walked into the Apple Valley, Minnesota Sprint Store. I had only been in Minnesota for about two months and was about to start training for my new job. Henry was also on a new adventure in civilian life just being honorably discharged from the United States Marine Corps. Henry was one of my trainers that day and all I can really remember is constantly laughing with him the entire day.


According to him, he was immediately smitten by me and made it his personal mission to ask me out. He didn’t exactly have the guts to do it, so he convinced his coworkers to invite me to a concert with him and a few others that weekend. We all went to that concert and had an amazing time! And very soon after it was clear we were no longer just Nicole or just Henry - we became Nicole & Henry, a couple, best buddies, two peas in a pod & now life long partners.


Big thank you to Leila Peterson for taking such beautiful pictures.
